statements: SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE block_num > 100;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE access_control = 1 ORDER BY block_num DESC;
SELECT permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY block_num ASC;
SELECT user_id, block_num FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin' AND access_control = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE block_num > 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE access_control = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, block_num, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level LIKE 'admin%' ORDER BY block_num ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT permission_level FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE block_num BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY user_id ASC, block_num DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, role FROM Users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM Users WHERE role='user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM Permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE 'READ%';
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM Permissions WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT permission_name, description FROM Permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM Users WHERE role IN ('admin', 'editor') AND username LIKE '%smith%' ORDER BY role, user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM Users JOIN Permissions ON Users.role = Permissions.permission_name GROUP BY Users.user_id HAVING COUNT(Users.user_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, email, role FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE role = 'Editor' ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id INNER JOIN permissions p ON p.permission_id = up.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM UserPermissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM UserRoles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM UserRolesMapping WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM RolePermissions WHERE role_id = 1 AND permission_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM UserRoles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT permission_id FROM RolePermissions WHERE role_id = 5 AND permission_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM UserRolesMapping WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, permission_level, blockchain_id FROM UserPermissions WHERE blockchain_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT username, email, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT count(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
